Wasserportal Berlin: get master data for a single station

Source: R/get_wasserportal_master_data.R
get_wasserportal_master_data.Rd

Wasserportal Berlin: get master data for a single station

Usage

get_wasserportal_master_data(master_url)

Arguments

master_url

url with master data for single station as retrieved by get_wasserportal_stations_table

Value

data frame with metadata for selected station

Examples

stations <- wasserportal::get_stations()
#> Importing 9 station overviews from Wasserportal Berlin ... ok. (10.92s) 

## GW Station
master_url <- stations$overview_list$groundwater.level$stammdaten_link[1]
get_wasserportal_master_data(master_url)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 11
#>   Nummer Bezirk  Betre…¹ Auspr…² Grund…³ Gelae…⁴ Rohro…⁵ Filte…⁶ Filte…⁷ Recht…⁸
#>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 1      Reinic… Senat   GW-Sta… Hauptg… 49.20   49.49   37.34   39.34   384415…
#> # … with 1 more variable: Hochwert_UTM_33_N <chr>, and abbreviated variable
#> #   names ¹​Betreiber, ²​Auspraegung, ³​Grundwasserleiter,
#> #   ⁴​Gelaendeoberkante_GOK_m_ue_NHN, ⁵​Rohroberkante_m_ue_NHN,
#> #   ⁶​Filteroberkante_m_u_GOK, ⁷​Filterunterkante_m_u_GOK, ⁸​Rechtswert_UTM_33_N

## SW Station
### Reduce  to monitoring stations maintained by Berlin
master_urls <- stations$overview_list$surface_water.water_level %>%
dplyr::filter(.data$Betreiber == "Land Berlin") %>%
dplyr::pull(.data$stammdaten_link)
get_wasserportal_master_data(master_urls[1])
#> # A tibble: 1 × 9
#>   Nummer  Name           Gewae…¹ Betre…² Auspr…³ Fluss…⁴ Pegel…⁵ Recht…⁶ Hochw…⁷
#>   <chr>   <chr>          <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 5865900 Allee der Kos… M.-H.-… Land B… DMA (W… 4.10    45.62   399363… 582052…
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​Gewaesser, ²​Betreiber, ³​Auspraegung,
#> #   ⁴​Flusskilometer, ⁵​Pegelnullpunkt_m, ⁶​Rechtswert_UTM_33_N,
#> #   ⁷​Hochwert_UTM_33_N
